title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 75.2 - Applicability and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 75.2 - Applicability and scope

State Regulations

This Part shall apply through the entire State of New York and shall represent minimum standards for individual onsite water supply and for individual onsite wastewater treatment systems. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
75.2

Amended

New

York State Register March 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 11, eff. 3/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
